question:
Consider the following climates:
  1. Tropical rainforest climate 
  2. Tropical monsoon climate 
  3. Savanna climate
Which of the above is/are subtype(s) of Megathermal Climate?
explanation:
As per Koppen climate classification, subtypes of Tropical/Megathermal Climates are:
  • Tropical rainforest climate
  • Tropical monsoon climate
  • Tropical wet and dry or savanna climate
